entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as someone who has made a mistake and is now acknowledging it. He is quoted saying 'I was a fool!' and listing various negative qualities about himself, such as being Ministry-loving, family-disowning, and power-hungry.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as someone who is present in the scene and is nearly dropping his photograph due to Percy's loud outburst.
